Name: Specify needs
Definition: Specify the needs and develop the design for a particular information or data acquisition or creation process.

Name: Acquire
Definition: Create, generate, extract, capture, enter, collect, receive, transfer, or ingest information or data physically or electronically.

Name: Store
Definition: Place information or ingest data into a location or repository.

Name: Clean
Definition: Prepare information or data for analysis.

Name: Contextualise
Definition: Capture metadata about the circumstances, conditions, or environment in which the information or data was acquired or is currently being used.

Name: Maintain
Definition: Manage the availability and integrity of information and data so that they can be accessed and understood over time.

Name: Engineer
Definition: Develop and construct data products and services, and integrate them into systems and business processes.

Name: Analyse
Definition: Explore and interpret information or data, and prepare final outputs.

Name: Curate
Definition: Continuously enrich or update information or data to keep it fit for purpose (business need).

Name: Evaluate
Definition: Assess the success of the information or data output, based on the expectations articulated in the Specify Needs node.

Name: Discover
Definition: Seek, and identify relevant information or data within a repository.

Name: Access
Definition: Enable or restrict permissions for individuals or systems to view, update, delete, or to otherwise use or manipulate specific information or data at various stages of their life cycles.

Name: Use
Definition: Employ, reuse, or repurpose existing information or data with the appropriate methods to achieve a goal, such as to support an organization's objectives, operations, or decision making.

Name: Share
Definition: Make information or data available for reuse outside the originator's control.

Name: Protect
Definition: Protect the confidentiality, availability, and integrity of information or data.

Name: Preserve
Definition: Ensure the authenticity, reliability, usability, and integrity of information or data in the long term, using appropriate processes and practices, and according to business needs or legal obligations.

Name: Dispose
Definition: Provide for the end-of-use and end-of-life of information and data in an organization.
